DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Optive®eye drop safe people wear contact lens dry eye . The second goal study determine use Optive®eye drop improve dry eye score standard dry eye test ( call OSDI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Optive Contact Lens Wearers With Dry Eyes
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 Selfreported use dailywear soft contact lenses proper fit least one month prior screen visit . Complaint dry eye OSDI score > 23 Use RGP PMMA contact lenses Poorly fit contact lenses Concurrent ocular condition pathology could affect contact lens fit patient 's ability complete study Concurrent use topical medication study medication Use systemic medication ocular dry sequela : Antihistamines Decongestants Antispasmotics Antidepressants Change contact lens care solution within prior 30 day
